sentence.Network_en: The West is stingy with aid.
sentence.Network_cn: 西方在援助上有点吝啬。

sentence.Network_en: Don't be so stingy with the money!
sentence.Network_cn: 用钱不要那样小手小脚!

PerfectNetExp.abs: 练习口语的经典句式，词组_百度知道 ... So so!- 马马虎虎！ Stingy!- 小气鬼！ Superb!- 棒极了！.
用英语形容一个人的品质_爱问知识人 ... broad-minded 心胸宽广的 stingy 吝啬的 humorous 幽默的.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... restitution n 赔偿，偿还 272 stingy a 小气的 distinguish a 区别；辩出.
任性的英文单词是什么_百度知道 ... 单纯 Simple 小气 Stingy 大方 Generous.

list.abs: 英文网名_英文网名大全2013最新版的_沪江英语 ... A monologue. 独白。 Not stingy. 不吝啬。 Reluctantly. 勉强。.
铁,铁字的解释,查字典 ... 铁工活[ ironwork] 铁公鸡[ iron cock;a stingy person;miser] 铁箍[ agrafe;iron hoop].
he is a very stingy person ., 他是个很小气的人.
一口气背成社交英语达人-百道网 ... 一心一意 wholeheartedly 一毛不拔 very stingy 一贫如洗 as poor as a church mouse.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: perhaps a dialect variant of the noun sting + -y

entry.def: If you describe someone as stingy, you are criticizing them for being unwilling to spend money.

example.ex: The West is stingy with aid...
example.tran: 西方在援助上有点吝啬。

example.ex: Winston was not a stingy man.
example.tran: 温斯顿不是个小气之人。

sentences.sentence: "an ungenerous response to the appeal for funds"

means.word_mean: 2. selfishly unwilling to share with others

auth_sentence.content: The Sport is stingy on headroom for the driver.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Sport is stingy on headroom for the driver.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Sport is stingy on headroom for the driver.

auth_sentence.content: He was stingy with compliments and liberal with criticism.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was stingy with compliments and liberal with criticism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was stingy with compliments and liberal with criticism.

auth_sentence.content: His father had been very stingy with the divorce settlement.
auth_sentence.res_content: His father had been very stingy with the divorce settlement.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His father had been very stingy with the divorce settlement.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =prick,表示"刺,刺激"; 2. 引申为火焰

stems_affixes.word_buile: distinguish区别,使杰出+ed……的→有区别的,与众不同的→著名的
sting刺,刺激+y……的→像刺一样[小的心胸]→小气的
sting刺,刺激→n.&v.刺,刺痛,剧痛;刺,叮
dis分开+sting刺,刺激+uish=ish表动词→把刺拿开→区别

stems_affixes.value_cn: 熄灭;消灭;结束;压制;使黯然失色;偿清

means.word_mean: 小气的,吝啬的；缺乏的、贫乏的。

sentences.en: After the death of his stingy wife,Edward loosened up a great deal.
sentences.cn: 爱德华在吝啬的妻子死后,用钱大方多了。
